# How to conduct an experiment

Before starting any experiment, it is essential to fill out a documentation sheet (<a href="https://loop.cloud." target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Loop Page</a>) by strictly following the provided template.

Additionally, make sure to store the related files in the appropriate locations:

- The SUMO map must be saved in: `sumo_module/app/examples/`

- The TensorBoard graphs must be saved in: `runs/`
